channel.title: CVE Feed for WHMCS Bridge -- WHMCS Bridge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WHMCS Bridge -- WHMCS Bridge

item.title: CVE-2021-4074|2024-08-03T17:16:03.778Z -- whmcs%20bridge -- whmcs%20bridge
item.description: The WHMCS Bridge WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the cc_whmcs_bridge_url parameter found in the ~/whmcs-bridge/bridge_cp.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 6.1. Due to missing authorization checks on the cc_whmcs_bridge_add_admin function, low-level authenticated users such as subscribers can exploit this vulnerability.
